person.persName: Percival Butler Hawkins (Bowling Green | Col. 11th KY Inf)

body.p: Bowling Green, Kentucky, attorney and school teacher. Spotsylvania County, Virginia, native. Elected to the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1850. Colonel of the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from November 11, 1861 to June 25, 1863. Elected to the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1863. Commissioner of the Board of Enrollment of the 3rd District of Kentucky from July 27, 1863 to November 12, 1863 and from March 28, 1864 to August 22, 1864. Commissioned Colonel of the 1st Regiment Capital Guards on July 11, 1864.
